name: run_command
description:
Run integration/script commands in the Playground of a remote XSOAR/XSIAM instance.

Requires:
- DEMISTO_BASE_URL environment variable
- DEMISTO_API_KEY environment variable

Use Cases:
- Test commands during development
- Debug integration behaviour
- Generate outputs from real responses

query.description: The command query to run. Example: '!ip ip=8.8.8.8'

incident_id.description: Run command in context of specific incident (optional, defaults to Playground)

debug.description: Enable debug mode for detailed output

json_to_outputs.description: Generate outputs schema from command response
